scripts.client-build: cd client && npm ci && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.server-build: cd server && npm ci --dev && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.heroku-prebuild: npm run client-build && npm run server-build && mv ./client/build ./server/dist/build

scripts.heroku-prebuild: npm run client-build && npm run server-build && mv ./client/build ./server/build
